text: The best pizza around! If you are gluten free or vegan there are delicious options. Hot, fresh oven-fired pizza.

name: Steve St.Clair
text: Pizza was fabulous. I love the concept of custom made personal pizzas. Each family member got exactly what they wanted.  Various crusts, sauces. Toppings galore and even some finishing sauces on top after it was cooked. Looking forward to next time.

name: Vetta Sutton
text: Was very impressed. 1st time there and I am picky when it comes to pizza. Been craving pizza for weeks but was being good due to new life style food. Build your own for 8 bucks😊😊😊😊

name: Don Warren
text: Pretty good Italian style pizza at a reasonable price.  Wish there was more variety on the menu and better drink choices.  It is a small step up from fast food but healthier and more tasty.   I would return if back in the area.

name: Kenneth Gilbert
text: Thank goodness for Blaze. I like pizza and I love having pizza made well. Blaze is on the spot with the best toppings and flavors for your perfect meal. I especially enjoy talking with everyone there too. That said, I'm sad that Covid 19 is …More

text: Better than other chain pizzas but not as good as many other area brick oven pizzas.

name: Joshua Hagen
text: Nice little pizza spot for all pizza lovers. I love the create your pizza option.

text: First let me say that I usually enjoy Blaze Pizza - but this was my first time coming to this particular location and they are seriously lacking in service and the food just isn't as good. …More

text: The pizza was delicious, hot, and fresh. The staff was courteous and helpful. Relatively small restaurant with single restrooms. Made-to-order pizzas with quality ingredients and toppings. Gluten-free and "keto-friendly" options.

name: Tiana Stephenson
text: The best pizza on the planet. Fresh ingredients will always win.

name: Aleta Bradford
text: This is a place you have to try. The pizza was to die for! The pizza was fresh and filling. I didn't have a greasy feel afterwards either. The pesto topping is a great addition. Definitely a must try. They have a forever customer.

text: Love that you can customize your personal pizza. You can do a half pizza and salad. Try the garlic knots !

text: Very yummy as always. Staff a little unprofessional with loud swearing and uncomfortable discussions about ethnicity. There were flies around the fixing area. But I was hungry and it was good. Guess the flies add a little extra flavor. Lol

text: Had the Cauliflower crust.  Topping and sauce choices were amazing.  Middle of the crust could have been crispier, but the service and food was good.  I had the lemon drink that was a refreshing change from a simple lemonade.  I love pizza places like this.

name: Jeff Allen
text: First time to visit this Decatur location and  as expected, great food, great prices, great staff that was very friendly. You really can beat the Blaze Pizza concept. They keep it simple and turn out awesome personalized pizza every time.

text: Prices were super reasonable (like $10) given the near-unlimited toppings you can select. Will definitely be back.

Best pizza I have ever liked is Blaze Pizzas.

name: Spencer Hammond Jr
text: Enjoyed myself there. They really know how to stack the toppings on. The pizza crust wasn't too hard yet still held everything together. Not a soggy mess which I hate.

name: Michelle Simmons
text: My first time experiencing Blaze Pizza and it was the best! The blood orange lemonade was so delicious and such a refreshing twist on lemonade. Thanks so much to Stephen who made our first visit a great one!

name: Jessica Burnett
text: Good pizza (sometimes its soggy from the balsamic "drizzle" more like pour, but I happen to love soggy bread), but not super filling at $9 a personal pie. Service has always been a miss for me, but I don't care if the teenagers who work here smile at me. Good thing, because they never do.

name: Shanice Dowdy
text: Best place to go if you're vegan but still want an actual pizza! It's fresh and delicious plus the employees at this location are awesome! I don't eat animal products so I try to avoid cross contamination and they are extremely helpful with making sure it doesn't happen. Hands down my favorite pizza spot.

name: Crystine Goebel
text: Delicious pizza made your way.... kinda like Subway,  you walk down the counter and point at the ingredients you want added to your pizza. Then it's but into a Blazing brick oven and it comes out DELISH!! Wonderful selection of unique drinks, too. Great place

name: Nick Gozalishvili
text: I love the pizzas here. The ability to make your own and constantly experiment is great. The service, however is not that amazing. These people don't come off as really friendly.

name: Robert Rivas
text: This experience was a mix between pleasant and unpleasant.  We ordered two pizzas, the first one came out of the oven in an acceptable time.  After waiting approximately 20 min for the second, I went to the counter to ask and they gave me a wrong pizza.  The manager intervened and apologized.  We got the right pizza without charge.

name: Yiping Wolgemuth
text: Terrible pizza as if they came from Pizza Hut. Way too much sauce and super greasy. Tried today with a promotion (now I know why there’s free pizza promo). Would never order again.

name: sophia brar
text: amazing Pizza and Salad options!great service .would surely be back.

text: Think MOD Pizza (for those who are familiar with the newer location in Decatur) —main difference is slightly cheaper prices on pizzas and ability to do half orders of salad and pizza. And instead of garlic sticks, they have garlic doughs.

text: Delicious, staff is always polite. Clean resturant, quick service.  5 stars because they have non-dairy cheese and gluten free options.
